name: Suppress Duplicate Variable Rendering
csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
 <citation>
 <layout>
 <text variable="title" prefix="Should print this: "/>
 <text variable="title" prefix=" ... but should NOT print this: "/>
 </layout>
 </citation>
</style>
